abstract.t: This document specifies a method and its architecture for proxyapplication based on the PKI environment with X.509 certificate[X.509]. This kind of proxy service is applicable in the occasionsthat a proxy entity is authorized by the client to implement thetasks with the service provider. As a typical application, thismethod can be used on DRM service regardless the specific DRMstandard which is implemented on the interface between the ClientDevice and Service Server. An DRM instance of the PKI proxy serviceis given in the appendix of this document and is fully addressed tosupport the proxy architecture defined in this document.
